Eco Friendly FR Grey Recycled Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

Ambiguity is the keyword with the washed pebble. It is so ambiguous we genuinely have no idea what colour it is. Somewhere on the grey/beige spectrum, it seems to sit around halfway giving it the remarkable ability to blend with a variety of decor styles. Placed amongst bolder colours like blues, reds or yellows, it acts to calm them down and make the room less overwhelming, whereas placing it with more earthy tones gives the room a neutral accent that sticks with grabs your attention.

Cotswold, Silverton Grey - Venetian Blind (247blinds)

Cotswold silverton grey brings a refreshingly elegant shade into your home by really bringing your window spaces to life. A modern palette of neutrals, greys and hints of blue, beautifully harmonise together to create a scheme that is cosy and modern. Cellular Taupe Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind (Swift directblinds)

Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

Cellular Blackout Taupe Solar/Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind (Swift directblinds)

Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

The indira charcoal is a unique and eye-catching roman blind featuring an array of beautifully drawn elephants surrounded by intricate patterning. The charcoal background is the perfect canvas for the creamy grey oatmeal of the imagery, and offsets it wonderfully. Team the charcoal with other charcoal greys, the occasional navy blue, and plenty of matching cream for cosy yet moody look in a den or sitting room, where warmth and comfort always come first.

greygrey-romanroman

Silver Birch, Willow - Roman Blind (247blinds)

The abstract trees and blossoms of the silver birch range are this time coloured in mustard yellow, turquoise aqua, and soft coral tones, tempered by greys and whites in the willow offering. The hushed yet pretty hues of the willow would be well-suited to adding just a hint of colour to an otherwise white or neutral room, where the aim is to keep the space feeling light, airy, and breathable. This could work beautifully in a utility room or downstairs cloakroom where space is limited and light is needed.

This woodland inspired design brings charcoal into alignment with a portfolio of autumnal colours to give your home something to really smile about. Partnering rosemist with a light grey feature wall and dark wooden floor is an inspired way to extend its colour spectrum out into your room.

greygrey-romanroman

Nightshade, Chrome - Day Night Blind (247blinds)

In silky silver, the nightshade in chrome offers not only style but versatile practicality too. In between the cool grey, double layered fabric sit sliding translucent strips, which can be moved up and down to ensure flexible light control. Combine the chrome with a contemporary all-white kitchen, foregoing conventional colour and opting for a stark look full of clean lines and sharp metallics. Keep the base of the room white, and choose chrome fixtures, fittings, and appliances for a distinct and stunning aesthetic.

greygrey-day-and-nightday-and-night

Nightshade, Steel - Day Night Blind (247blinds)

In the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other ranges to further protect from outside lights. Whilst the steel will match a range of colour schemes, it will look particularly striking amidst a navy and white colour scheme in a dining room.

greygrey-day-and-nightday-and-night

Rift Softshade Mono Grey Day and Night Blind (Swift directblinds)

Add the finishing touch to a clean and contemporary interior with the rift softshade mono day and night roller blind. This blind makes creating optimum light levels in your home super easy. The practical design of cool grey fabric panels with translucent voile strips in-between enables you to gain a sense of privacy with partial shading - perfect for making the most of natural light. greygrey-romanroman

Kent, Charcoal - Roman Blind (247blinds)

Traditional meets contemporary in the kent charcoal, with its classic chenille-like texture and modern lead grey hue. The unity works beautifully though, forming a rich and luxurious roman blind that you won't want to miss out on. Settle the charcoal amongst a monochromatic colour scheme for modern chic in the dining room. Or, if you love a splash of colour, team with a bright teal for a contemporary and striking tonal look, whether in the living room or master bedroom.

Eco Friendly FR Grey Panel Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their eco-friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Luna blackoutgraphite grey perfect fit pleated blind. Part of ourluna blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

greygrey-roofroof

Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

For a darker grey in your window the hampton grey pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The perfect fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes.

greygrey-hamptongrey-hampton-perfect-fitgrey-perfect-fithamptonhampton-perfect-fitperfect-fit

Kingston Flint Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

The kingston fabrics have a pebble-dash effect to them that creates an organic fabric that matches gorgeously with other organic materials and furnishings. Kingston flint's stone-grey tone is a dappling texture in a dimout style, allowing gentle light levels to pass through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.

Daytona, Horizon Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

Soft and subtle, the daytona in horizon grey is a pretty shade of grey that works as an attractive neutral for stronger tones. The durable, high quality faux wood the shutter is made from is energy efficient, water-resistant, and not prone to warping or cracking. Choose from three distinct shutter types. Daytona, Dignity Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

An attractive mid-grey, the dignity grey, from the daytona range, can be the star of the show or the colour-popping neutral. Choose from versatile tier on tier, traditional full height, or boutique caf styles. Team the dignity grey with a dark grass green for an unusual and quirky colour scheme that brings the outside in. Try this for a striking look in the dining room or den. Include the occasional pale grey to lighten the look and add some extra depth to the theme.

greygrey-daytonagrey-daytona-shutters-andgrey-shutters-anddaytonadaytona-shutters-andshutters-and

Daytona, Shark Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

In prettiest pale grey, the daytona in shark grey is sweet and subtle. The durable, high quality faux wood that it's made from is water-resistant, so won't warp or crack in any room in the home. Choose from three shutter styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Team the shark grey with a pure red tone for a strong and stylish colour scheme, perfect for a contemporary home. Keep the red to a minimum to avoid overpowering the room and include plenty of white and grey tones.

Bayham, Taupe Grey - Vista Blind (247blinds)

Bayham taupe grey allows you to add a unique modern touch to your home whilst combining it with a timeless colour that brings a classically calming presence to your decor. The lightweight voile hangs effortlessly as you adjust the angle of the finely woven fabric to give the perfect light level for any occasion. We love the look of taupe grey in the kitchen or a cosy cottage style living room. Woods, slate, the fireplace, no matter what authentic style you decide to pair it with you are guaranteed to create a harmony with the existing decor whilst adding the modern touch of their unique vista style.

Daytona, Stratus Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

Cool, calm, and bang on trend, the dove grey tone of the daytona in stratus grey is soothing and serene. All of the daytona range are made from high quality, durable faux wood, and are available in three unique styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Go for a fashion-forward choice of colour scheme by pairing the stratus grey with a dusky pink tone for a look that's both romantic and contemporary at the same time.

greygrey-daytonagrey-daytona-shutters-andgrey-shutters-anddaytonadaytona-shutters-andshutters-and

Daytona, Platinum Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

The pale, serene platinum grey from the daytona range is pretty and subtle, making it the perfect alternative to white or cream. Choose from three styles: the classic full height, the boutique caf, or the versatile tier on tier. Use the platinum grey to complement any colour scheme. Try it with a bold plum purple for a striking and moody look in a dining room, furnishing with dark to medium woods and plenty of shimmering silvers to add a little glitz and glamour.

greygrey-daytonagrey-daytona-shutters-andgrey-shutters-anddaytonadaytona-shutters-andshutters-and

Daytona, Pigeon Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

The soft, barely-there grey hue of the daytona in pigeon grey is subtle and serene. The flawlessly painted faux wood is durable and water-resistant, so there's no need to worry about cracking or warping. Choose from full height, tier on tier, or caf. Blend the pigeon grey with soft blues for a calming ambience in room made for relaxing, such as the living room or a nursery. Include plenty of plush fabrics to make the room welcoming and comfortable, opting for chenilles and soft wools.

greygrey-daytonagrey-daytona-shutters-andgrey-shutters-anddaytonadaytona-shutters-andshutters-and

Daytona, Dolphin Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

The daytona in dolphin grey shows a classic light grey tone that will work in any surrounding, traditional or contemporary. Made from durable, high quality faux wood, it is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three unique, attractive styles: tier on tier, full height, or caf. Colour the wall surrounding the dolphin in a cheery lemon yellow that will allow the grey hue to pop in a colour scheme that's bang on trend.

greygrey-daytonagrey-daytona-shutters-andgrey-shutters-anddaytonadaytona-shutters-andshutters-and

Daytona, Falcon Grey - Plantation Shutter (247blinds)

A deep, characterful grey with coffee undertones, the daytona in falcon grey is striking yet understated. The water-resistant faux wood makes it ideal for use in the kitchen or the bathroom, where it won't be prone to any warping or cracking. Choose from three unique shutter styles. Settle the falcon grey into a neutrally toned room filled with greys, beiges, oatmeals, and creams. The end result will be one of understated luxe, and you'll find it relaxing and serene, perfect for a bedroom or living room.

Splash Tropez Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The fabric also has beautiful light filtering properties. Electric blinds are perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. Eco Friendly FR Grey Recycled Electric Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Their eco-friendly, recycled electric roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey electric roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.
